description: After wrecking their house during a chase, Tom and Jerry enter a race around the world where the winner gets a new fancy house.
keywords: bear,race car,hyperbolic jaw drop,fight cloud,tongue stuck on a pole
name: Tom and Jerry: The Fast and the Furry

original_info.id: Tom and Jerry: The Fast and the Furry_2005
original_info.name: Tom and Jerry: The Fast and the Furry

review.name: Very Enjoyable & Funny
review.reviewBody: This was the last movie Tom and Jerry creator Joseph Barbera and it shows. This movie is very enjoyable and fun. This animation is creative, fast paced, and colorful. The comedy both verbal and visual are all funny. And the voice acting is top notch with great voice actors like Tom Kenny, Rob Paulson, and more doing great performances. The greatest part of the movie to me is that Joseph Barbera helped make the movie when he was 95 years old. 95!!! And that since William Hanna passed away a few years prior, Joseph had to work on this movie without his partner and to think this is as great as it is is fantastic. I highly recommend it.
